Omg second bus trauma of the day woman beside me tried to just move her legs so I could climb over her, rather than get up, and I had to say "I won't fit". Kill me now.
There is not a single window open on this bus and honestly I'm shocked there's not more bus related violence in the mornings

PS: #iworkwithODEON. As part of our collaboration, I go to two screenings a month; I review the films; I post on Instagram and I tweet about the blog posts. These tweets are not paid for, but you should know that there is a pre-existing relationship. And I get free sweets.

Anyway, Screen Unseen is something that happens @ODEONcinemasIRE pretty regularly - it's always a film that hasn't been released yet, guaranteed to be one they think is a future classic and, for the wusses among us, never a horror film. Here endeth my Screen Unseen lesson.
BTJA = better than Jupiter Ascending, the 2015 space opera starring Mila Kunis, Channing Tatum, Eddie Redmayne and Sean Bean WTJA = worse than Jupiter Ascending (duh)

I think it's probably for the same reason that I don't generally watch trailers for movies before I go to see them - nor do I read reviews. I want to go in with zero clue and be able to make up my own mind! I rate movies based on whether they are BTJA or WJA

As someone who does not enjoy surprises (what? we exist and we matter!), I was surprised by how much I enjoyed not knowing what the film was at the last @ODEONcinemasIRE Screen Unseen! FWIW it was A Simple Favor, review here: https://t.co/FjzasDdZIh #iworkwithODEON
